ProductData.question: Where can I use digibank?
ProductData.answer: digibank is available to everyone residing in India. Just download, and get your digibank e-wallet in 90 seconds! You can convert to a digiSavings account with any of our partner stores. Don't wait, come and see us now: www.dbs.com/digibank/in/cities.html

ProductData.question: What kinds of fees does digibank charge?
ProductData.answer:
For the latest information on fees, please refer to our Rates & Fees page.

Withdrawing cash at any ATM in India is completely free - even if you withdraw more than 5 times in the same month!

ProductData.question: What kind of safety features does digibank have?
ProductData.answer:
Your security is extremely important to us, and we've gone to great lengths to ensure it. Within the digibank app, we use two-factor authentication (2FA) - a combination of your password and a unique One-Time Password that is auto generated in real time - to protect against malicious external parties. All transactions that you make are constantly monitored for fraud, and our systems and infrastructure are always updated to stay ahead of threats.

digibank, which is a part of DBS Bank Ltd., has won Global Finance's "Safest Bank in Asia" accolade for seven consecutive years, from 2009 to 2015.

ProductData.question: What is dynamic inbuilt security?
ProductData.answer: Tired of constantly being asked for OTP? This new security feature ensures you no longer need it if you register your device with us. This is possible because digibank has an embedded soft token security, avoiding the need to wait for SMSs to arrive and providing even stronger security for transaction authorisation. Authentication will now happen securely and automatically every time you transact. No more waiting for OTP, ever! Happy Banking.

ProductData.question: Why do I have to use the dynamic inbuilt security?
ProductData.answer: Your security is extremely important to us, and we've gone to great lengths to ensure it. With this new security tool you are no longer asked for an OTP if you register your device with us. Authentication will now happen securely and automatically every time you transact. All your financial transactions will be protected against malicious external parties.

ProductData.question: Do I have an option to not use the dynamic inbuilt security?
ProductData.answer: No, you don't have the option of not using the new authentication mechanism. It's safe, convenient and removes the pain of waiting for the SMS OTP to arrive and keying it in. Why would you not want to use it?

ProductData.question: Why was I locked out of the app while upgrading to the dynamic inbuilt security?
ProductData.answer: It's because you keyed in an incorrect One Time Password (OTP) required to complete the upgrade. As a security measure, your account is temporarily locked. Our customer care agent will get in touch with you to assist you in unlocking the account and completing the upgrade.

ProductData.question: I am not receiving the OTP while upgrading to the dynamic inbuilt security? How should I proceed?
ProductData.answer: In case you're not receiving the split 8 digit One Time Password (OTP) required to upgrade, please reach out to us by calling the customer call centre number which gets displayed on the split 8 digit OTP screen. The number will be displayed on the OTP screen in the digibank app during the upgrade flow.

ProductData.question: What are digibank e-wallet and digiSavings, and how are they different?
ProductData.answer:
digibank e-wallet is what you get when you first sign up with digibank. It comes with a virtual debit card, bill payments, funds transfers, budgeting, expense tracking, and powerful customer support.

You can think of digiSavings as the full-featured savings account that comes with everything you'd expect: deposits, interest, a debit card, and no minimums or maximums. digiSavings also comes with everything in digibank e-wallet. To qualify for digiSavings, you need to verify your identity with us by providing your fingerprint.

ProductData.question: How much interest can I earn?
ProductData.answer:
You can earn up to 7% interest on your savings account (also known as digiSavings). However, in practice it's a little more complicated. You will earn:

  • 7% interest below 1 lakh balance
  • 6% interest from 1 lakh to less than 1 crore
  • 4% interest for 1 crore and above

ProductData.question: What are the requirements for opening a bank account?
ProductData.answer:
To register for digibank e-wallet, you simply need to provide your name, date of birth, email address, mobile phone number, and city. To open a digiSavings, you need to provide your fingerprint for biometric authentication, your Aadhaar number, and your PAN.

In both cases, you need to be an Indian resident who is at least 18 years old.

ProductData.question: How long does it take to activate my new account?
ProductData.answer: Opening a digibank e-wallet takes less than 90 seconds. You can convert to a digiSavings account by completing your biometric authentication at any of our partner stores. Come and see us now: www.dbs.com/digibank/in/cities.html

ProductData.question: How do I fund my account?
ProductData.answer: Your digibank account can be funded by using your debit card, internet banking or by transferring funds from another bank.

ProductData.question: What are the requirements for opening a fixed deposit?
ProductData.answer: You will need a digiSavings to open a deposit. Fixed deposits have a minimum principal amount of Rs. 10,000, or in the case of a recurring deposit, Rs. 100.

ProductData.question: Are digibank deposits insured?
ProductData.answer: digibank deposits are insured up to Rs. 1,00,000 (1 lakh) under the Deposit Insurance and Credit Guarantee Corporation (DICGC), a subsidiary of the Reserve Bank of India.

ProductData.question: Does digibank offer joint accounts or small business accounts?
ProductData.answer: We don't offer joint personal accounts or small business accounts right now.

ProductData.question: Can I make investments with digibank?
ProductData.answer: We don't offer investment products at this time, but we hope to in the near future. Check back soon!

ProductData.question: What benefits do I get with the debit card?
ProductData.answer:
Your virtual debit card, which comes with digibank e-wallet, can be used for online and electronic transactions in India, within specified limits.

Your physical debit card, which comes with digiSavings, can be used anywhere regular debit cards can be used, including online and point of sale transactions, as well as overseas. You also get free unlimited cash withdrawals at nearly 2,00,000 ATMs across India.

Both debit cards are subject to usage limits.

ProductData.question: What rewards can I get with digibank?
ProductData.answer: Check out our deals page for the latest offers. Our rewards, deals, and offers are changing all the time. It simply wouldn't be possible to list them all here!

ProductData.question: How do I qualify for cashback?
ProductData.answer: We are offering cash back on qualifying transactions done on your digibank debit card. Find more details for our cashback program: www.dbs.com/digibank/in/deals.html

ProductData.question: How can I find if I get my cashback?
ProductData.answer: Cashback will be reflected in your transaction history. It would have the word "cashback" in the transaction description.

ProductData.question: Is there a cap on cashback amount?
ProductData.answer: Yes there is a cap on cashback, please find below details for our cashback program: www.dbs.com/digibank/in/deals.html

ProductData.question: When will I get my cashback?
ProductData.answer: Your cashback rewards shall be accumulated and credited to your account at the end of each month.

ProductData.question: I think there's been fraudulent activity on my account.
ProductData.answer:
We will work with you to resolve any issues swiftly and responsibly. Please call us immediately:

  • 1800-210-3456 or 1800-103-8578 toll-free within India, or
  • +91-44-6685-4585 or +91-44-4902-1180 if dialing internationally

ProductData.question: I've lost my phone / I can't access the app.
ProductData.answer:
The first thing you should do is ensure that no one else can access your debit card and bank account. If you were logged in to the app when you lost your mobile, please call us immediately :

  • 1800-210-3456 or 1800-103-8578 toll-free within India, or
  • +91-44-6685-4585 or +91-44-4902-1180 if dialing internationally

If you were logged out, you should log in to the digibank app on another smart phone and block your debit card to prevent possible misuse.

Once you've taken these steps, you can download digibank onto your replacement phone.

ProductData.question: I've forgotten my username.
ProductData.answer: You can retrieve your username by tapping on the 'forgot username' link on the login page of the digibank app.

ProductData.question: I've forgotten my password.
ProductData.answer: You can reset your password by tapping on the 'forgot password' link on the login page of the digibank app.

ProductData.question: I've forgotten my debit card PIN.
ProductData.answer: You can reset your debit card PIN from the debit card details page within the digibank app.

ProductData.question: I've lost my debit card.
ProductData.answer: You should block your debit card immediately by accessing the dashboard menu within the digibank app. Once you've done this, you can request for a new debit card.

ProductData.question: I'm changing my mobile number.
ProductData.answer: You'll need to update your profile information so that you can receive alerts, notifications, and OTPs (One-Time Passwords) for security purposes. You can change your mobile number at any time from your Profile.
